div1.p: Augustus O. Bourn, Jr. Counselor at Law Corn Exchange Bank Building 11-19 William Street
Hon. Chevalier de Cuvelier, Monister des Affaires Etrange, 20 rue de Namur, Brussels, Belgium

Dear Sir:- I send you herewith a petition in French, requesting your Government to appoint me as Consul for the Congo Free State Resident in New York. I will send you substantially the same in a letter writ- ten in English, so that we may understand ourselves. If the Govern- ment should see fit to appoint me as Consul Resident in New York, I am confident that I can increase the commerce very greatly between the Congo Free State and the United States. My position here as lawyer qualifies me to fill the position and certain influence which I pos- sess in mercantile circles will enable me to very materially increase the commerce between the two countries, and I think in other ways to help you. I remain, dear sir, very respectfully, Augustus O. Bourn Jr.
